column2: "<%me>, are you searching for the rumored rampaging dragon as well?"
"Me? No, personally I'm not interested, but there is one thing I find curious."
"Is the rumored dragon in this case really a Dragonkin?"
"As you know, Dragonkin posses high intellect and can communicate, to some degree."
"Even Dragonkin under the influence of Darkers are able to understand words, even if they can't control their actions."
"This is only what I can say from what I've seen so far. I'm still collecting data."
